directions: Bring water and salt to a boil in a saucepan. Stir oats into boiling water.
Cook oats until thick and soft, 20 to 30 minutes.
Stir milk, cashews, cranberries, coconut, vanilla extract, and cinnamon into cooked oats; continue cooking 10 minutes more, stirring frequently.
Sprinkle sugar over the oats to serve.
ingredients: 1/4 cup sweetened dried cranberries (such as Ocean Spray® Craisins®)
1 pinch white sugar, or to taste (optional)
title: Steel-Cut Oatmeal
